body_html: Thanks @aselle @sampepose for the idea. I already tried this solution and it did not work, but I'm not sure where the option shall be applied: in the "bazel build" command of the custom op? or in the "bazel buil" of tensorflow? or elsewhere ? Many thanks for your help.

body: Thanks @aselle @sampepose for the idea. I already tried this solution and it did not work, but I'm not sure where the option shall be applied: in the "bazel build" command of the custom op? or in the "bazel buil" of tensorflow? or elsewhere ? Many thanks for your help.
